update tbl_excellent
enroll_id = #{enrollId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_excellent set enroll_id = #{enrollId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_excellent set enroll_id = #{enrollId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ex.id, enroll_id, prize_id, cover_url, finish_time, author, ex.create_time, ex.update_time , ,title_enroll from tbl_excellent ex,tbl_enroll en where ex.enroll_id = en.id
select ex.id, enroll_id, prize_id, cover_url, finish_time, author, ex.create_time, ex.update_time , ,title_enroll from tbl_excellent ex,tbl_enroll en where ex.enroll_id = en.id and ex.id = #{id}
select count(*) from vm_excellent where prize_id = #{id}
